actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: A bill to amend section 844 of title 18, United States Code, to increase penalties for destruction of Federal property by explosives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to increase the terms of imprisonment for the destruction of Federal property by the use of explosives. Prohibits the court from imposing a suspended or probationary sentence. Specifies five mitigating factors and eight aggravating factors for consideration in determining whether to impose the death penalty.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 844 of title 18, United States Code, to increase penalties for destruction of Federal property by explosives, and for other purposes.
